__TOC__

People dedicated to improving the user experience for Ubuntu itself, and for open-source applications that run on Ubuntu.

This team will coordinate activities like persona generation, distributed user testing, heuristic evaluations, publishing and promoting design guidelines, and collection of ideas from Brainstorm, forums and elsewhere.

As with Ubuntuâ€™s Desktop team and Kernel team, you do not need to be a member of the Launchpad team to take part in Ayatana UX activities. Join the Ayatana mailing list to keep track of our activities: https://launchpad.net/~ayatana

Related teams:
- Papercutters, who look after Papercuts bug reports <https://launchpad.net/~papercutters>
- Ubuntu Artwork, who work on icons, themes, and backgrounds <https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-art>
